title.native: 抱かれたい男1位に脅されています。
title.english: DAKAICHI -I'm being harassed by the sexiest man of the year-

description:
Takato Saijyo has reigned as the idol industry's "Most Huggable" for five years, that is, until freshman actor Junta Azumaya. Takato was always considered brusque while Azumaya's smile is winning over admirers by comparison. The whole fiasco drives Takato to over indulge in alcohol and his actions catch the attention of the last person he wants to see. To his surprise, Azumaya uses this new info to blackmail Takato for physical affection.

(Source: Anime News Network)

tags.name: Boys' Love
tags.description: Prominently features romance between two males, not inherently sexual.

tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of male characters.

tags.description: Centers around the activities of a certain occupation.

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

tags.name: Yandere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is obsessively in love with another, to the point of acting deranged or violent.

title.native: 抱かれたい男1位に脅されています。
劇場版 抱かれたい男1位に脅されています。～スペイン編～

node.description:
[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/龍輪直征)

He began his career in 2000 as an animator at Studio Giants; in 2004, he began working for [Shaft](https://anilist.co/studio/44/), where in 2011 he made his debut as a director with [Katte ni Kaizou](https://anilist.co/anime/10191/). In 2016 he left Shaft and went freelance. In 2019, he started working for [Passione](https://anilist.co/studio/911/).

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/芝美奈子)

Noted for her character designs on [Black Butler](https://anilist.co/anime/4898/), [Noir](https://anilist.co/anime/272/), [Tegami Bachi](https://anilist.co/anime/6444/) among many others.

__Graduated:__ Kunitachi College of Music (Department of Composition)

[Artist Profile (Miracle Bus)](http://miraclebus.com/composer/masaruyokoyama) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/masaruyokoyama)

**Yokoyama Masaru** is a Japanese composer, arranger, keyboardist and programmer affiliated with Miracle Bus.

Though he was a Physics major at Chiba University, he joined an Anime Research Club that inspired him to enter the industry. He started as a Production Assistant affiliated with [A-1 Pictures](https://anilist.co/studio/561/A1-Pictures) and gradually moved to directorial roles.

Though he was a Physics major at Chiba University, he joined an Anime Research Club that inspired him to enter the industry. He started as a Production Assistant affiliated with [A-1 Pictures](https://anilist.co/studio/561/A1-Pictures) and gradually moved to directorial roles.
Representative director of [Aniplex](https://anilist.co/studio/17/). Board Director at [CloverWorks](https://anilist.co/studio/6222/CloverWorks).
Representative Director and CEO of publishing company [Libre](https://libre-inc.co.jp/).
A former Studio Easter employee. Debuted as an art director on [Guin Saga](https://anilist.co/anime/5041/).
Tomohisa regularly uploads acoustic covers of Vocaloid songs on Nico Nico Douga as an utaite (singer). He debuts under his real name Sakou Tomohisa.

__[Website](http://uni-mafumafu.jp/) | [Blog (JP)](https://ameblo.jp/uni-mafumafu) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/uni_mafumafu) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCOTR1tcOAhjgi6YukrPpZxg) | [Piapro](https://piapro.jp/uni_mafumafu)__

__Introduction:__
Mafumafu, alternatively known as Kagami Mite Shisshin-P, is a Japanese vocalist, lyricist, composer, arranger, vocaloid producer, and audio engineer. He is better known as a utaite with a middle-high range voice.

__Biography:__
As a utaite he likes to add effects to his voice and scream loudly in his covers. He has a very wide vocal range and a versatile voice, having the ability to hit and leap into high notes effortlessly, sometimes to feminine range, without sounding strained or loosing the softness in his voice. However, he also sounds pleasant when he sings songs in his regular and lower voice, which can sound relaxing and quite soothing. On some of his covers, many people are often confused and argue about his gender when he utilizes his higher register, therefore making him a ryouserui. Because of his high vocal range, he is also capable of producing a very convincing female voice, most clearly seen in his cover of Matryoshka. He often makes use of his wide range in his covers by leaping into higher or lower octaves to match the tone of the song.

Occasionally he forgets some of the lyrics and either mumbles or makes cute noises until the next line. His songs are often tagged as someone with a "kakuseirui", also known as an energizing voice.
Tomohisa regularly uploads acoustic covers of Vocaloid songs on Nico Nico Douga as an utaite (singer). He debuts under his real name Sakou Tomohisa.
Tomohisa regularly uploads acoustic covers of Vocaloid songs on Nico Nico Douga as an utaite (singer). He debuts under his real name Sakou Tomohisa.

__Introduction:__
Mafumafu, alternatively known as Kagami Mite Shisshin-P, is a Japanese vocalist, lyricist, composer, arranger, vocaloid producer, and audio engineer. He is better known as a utaite with a middle-high range voice.

He has a very wide vocal range and a versatile voice, having the ability to hit and leap into high notes effortlessly, sometimes to feminine range, without sounding strained or loosing the softness in his voice. On some of his covers, many people are often confused and argue about his gender when he utilizes his higher register, therefore making him a ryouserui. Because of his high vocal range, he is also capable of producing a very convincing female voice, most clearly seen in his cover of Matryoshka. He often makes use of his wide range in his covers by leaping into higher or lower octaves to match the tone of the song.

Occasionally he forgets some of the lyrics and either mumbles or makes cute noises until the next line. His songs are often tagged as someone with a "kakuseirui", also known as an energizing voice.

streamingEpisodes.title: Episode 1 - "In show business, it's either eat or be eaten."
Episode 2 - "I guess he's already over me."
Episode 3 - Molesting. Just don't do it.
Episode 5 - I can make you my woman.
Episode 6 - Why am I at a hotel with him… Did we… There's no way... Is there!?
Episode 7 - Can I keep liking you?
Episode 8 - H-Hands off my swim trunks.
Episode 9 - …I guess you two are close.
Episode 11 - If you're that in love with me, you can have your way with me until you're done.
